text: Kevin Michael Richardson (born October 25, 1964) is an American actor, producer, writer and voice artist. ==Filmography== == Personal life == Richardson married his wife Monica in May 2006. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors who played the Joker Category:American movie actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York City Category:Writers from New York City
title: Kevin Michael Richardson
